participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: adventurous and resourceful, enjoys exploring nature and learning new skills.
participant_1.background: my parents taught me survival skills. i walk dogs for a living. i'm an avid kayaker. i'm also a graduate student.

participant_2.name: Sophie

content.text: are you a woman or a man?
